chav1961.funnypro.core.interfaces

Interface IFProRepo


  • public interface IFProRepo

    This interface describes FPro repository.

    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IFProRepo.NameAndArity
      This interface describes all the entity types in the fact/rule base

    • Method Detail

      • canUseInMultiThread

        boolean canUseInMultiThread()

        Can use this repository in multiThread environment

        Returns:
        true if yes. When true, all methods need to be thread-safe!

      • canUseForMultiThreadOnResolution

        boolean canUseForMultiThreadOnResolution()

        Can use this repository for muitlThread resolution. When canUseInMultiThread returns false, need return false too!

        Returns:
        true if yes. When true, using of retractAll and call with 'module' parameter are available, else their call need throws UnsupportedOperationException

      • assertA

        void assertA(IFProEntity value)

        Assert predicate to the beginning of the chain. This method id thread-safe

        Parameters:
        value - value to assert

      • assertZ

        void assertZ(IFProEntity value)

        Assert predicate to the end of the chain. This method id thread-safe

        Parameters:
        value - value to assert

      • retractAll

        void retractAll(IFProEntity value)

        Retract all predicates matched with this predicate. This method is thread-safe

        Parameters:
        value - template to match

      • retractAll

        void retractAll(IFProEntity value,
                int module)

        Retract all predicates matched with this predicate. This method is not thread-safe and need to be special management

        Parameters:
        value - template to match
        module - thread seq to distribute resource processing to some threads

      • retractAll

        void retractAll(long id,
                int arity)

        Retract all predicates matched with this predicate. This method is thread-safe

        Parameters:
        id - predicate id to remove
        arity - predicate arity to remove

      • retractFirst

        boolean retractFirst(IFProEntity value)

        Retract first entity in the entities chain

        Parameters:
        value - entity to retract
        Returns:
        true if retraction was successful

      • call

        java.lang.Iterable<IFProEntity> call(IFProEntity value)

        Select all predicates matched with this predicate

        Parameters:
        value - template to match
        Returns:
        list of matched predicates. Can be empty but not null. If some predicates will be retracted from the repo, list will skip it on the next(). If some predicated will be asserted into the repo, they will not be appeared here before ending iterative process

      • call

        java.lang.Iterable<IFProEntity> call(IFProEntity value,
                                     int module)

        Select all predicates matched with this predicate

        Parameters:
        value - template to match
        module - thread seq to distribute resource processing to some threads
        Returns:
        list of matched predicates. Can be empty but not null. If some predicates will be retracted from the repo, list will skip it on the next(). If some predicated will be asserted into the repo, they will not be appeared here before ending iterative process

      • content

        java.lang.Iterable<IFProRepo.NameAndArity> content(int arity,
                                                   long... ids)

        Select content of the database types

        Parameters:
        arity - arity to select. Type -1 to select all arities
        ids - ids to select. Don't type any values to select all types
        Returns:
        names and arities for database content. Can be empty but not null
